mapper.select: select count(*) from product where productId > 0 and isProductCheck = 1;

select image.productId, categoryName, productTitle, productContent, startPrice, bidPrice, startTime, expireTime, min(uploadPath) as uploadPath, min(uploadFileName) as uploadFileName, min(fileExtension) as fileExtension from image left join product on product.productId = image.productId
where isProductCheck = 1
group by image.productId
order by startTime desc
limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
